If your Azure resource uses IP firewall rules tofilter incoming calls, you need to create an inbound rule in your firewall that admitsindexer requests.This article explains how to find the IP address of your search service and configure aninbound IP rule on an Azure Storage account. While specific to Azure Storage, thisapproach also works for other Azure resources that use IP firewall rules for data access,such as Azure Cosmos DB and Azure SQL.1. Get the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of your search service. This looks like<search-service-name>.search.windows.net.
